Sample.Name: GettingStartedDocIO
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create simple Word document with text, images and tables.

Sample.Name: BuiltInStyle
Sample.Title: Built-in Style
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to format the Word document contents with the built-in styles.

Sample.Name: CustomStyle
Sample.Title: Custom Style
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to format the Word document contents with user defined styles.

Sample.Name: BookmarkNavigation
Sample.Title: Bookmark Navigation
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert, retrieve, replace and delete the contents of a specified bookmark using BookmarkNavigator functionality of DocIO.

Sample.Name: DocIO_PieChart
Sample.Title: Pie Chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a pie chart in a Word document.

Sample.Name: DocIO_BarChart
Sample.Title: Bar Chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a bar chart in a Word document with the data from an existing Excel file.

Sample.Name: MailMerge
Sample.Title: Mail Merge
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a letter format document by filling the data using Mail merge functionality of DocIO.

Sample.Name: FormFillingAndProtection
Sample.Title: Form Filling and Protection
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to fill data and protect the content controls in an existing Word document.

Sample.Name: XMLMapping
Sample.Title: XML Mapping
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to map custom XML part to content controls in the Word document.

Sample.Name: WordToHTML
Sample.Title: Word to HTML
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to convert a Word document into HTML file.
